data.name: Port Imagination
data.detailed_description:
Play as Pots Jr., a valued friend of Sam from the popular children's series Virtue Vista Valley! Explore the up and coming town of Port Imagination! Meet famous former residents of the Valley! Help them solve their problems so you can board the boat to Identity Island!

Become the best friend they've ever had!

Features and Goals

  • Explore Port Imagination, a never finished vacation resort.
  • Avoid dire consequences.
  • Meet more than a dozen characters.
  • Solve puzzles to help the locals and earn your ticket to Identity Island!
  • Don't let Rugar the Miner confuse you.
  • Delve into conversations to understand people's problems.
  • Make sure Rugar gets his breakfast!
  • Learn to be forever true!

What is Port Imagination?

Port Imagination is a short (approximately 2 hour) hand-drawn and animated Horror RPG from the author of the horror audio drama, Weeping Cedars. You play as Pots Jr., a little guy who, until recently, was one of Sam's good friends on the long running children's show, Virtue Vista Valley.



Players will explore different areas of Port Imagination, talk to characters, and complete quests.


This game is not for those who are easily disturbed.

data.short_description: Play as Pots Jr. in this short and disturbing slow-horror RPG. Explore the tropical town of Port Imagination while you wait for the ship to take you to Identity Island. Make new friends, avoid dire consequences, and learn to remain forever true!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
